summary: Exchange the 1h swing sounds of daggers with their own swing sounds.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Dagger Sounds 4 Daggers © 2012 Crystan

-> Nexus exclusive mod <-[/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

This Mod exchange the 1h swing sounds of daggers with special dagger swing sounds. Actually I never use daggers but it always bugged me that the daggers have the same swing sounds as the 1h blades.

[youtube]NsN1gPUHK9I[/youtube]

The sounds are completly self made (recorded and edited).

[center]
Checkout my other Mods for Skyrim:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31039][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/31039-1-1360089051.png[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17903][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/17903-2-1368962766.jpg[/img][/url]
Improved Horse Step Sounds | Better Weapon Swing Sounds[/center]

NOTE: You're not allowed to share/use/modify/upload my Files/Sounds without my >explicit< permission! Not even in a Mod, Compilation or in something else.
[center]
--------------------------------------
